website_summaries.verdict: Thoughtfully engineered from the blade to its handle, this little pizza cutter covers all the bases for a very reasonable price.
pros: Easy to use with an integrated handle that allows for better control
Comfortable non-slip handle doesn't let grease or toppings get in the way of the perfect cut
Features a convenient retractable blade guard
cons: Needs to be dismantled for cleaning
Works for thick crusts, but may get a little messy

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I'm Italian-American. I make pizza weekly in my house. I have the stone which has been passed down from earlier generations and the secret recipes. All is good, my kids, their friends, they all come over to our house when Dad is making pizza. A couple kids even nicknamed me Papa John. I quickly corrected them that it was insulting as my pizza is the best! The only ingredient I was missing was a decent pizza cutter. That was in the past, this is a GAME CHANGER! Works great, is safe and way better than any other design. I was skeptical at first until I used it. Now this rocks!! Mangia!!!
customer_reviews.author: Educator Dude

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept -- More Effort to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. After using it for awhile, I find it it is more effort to clean, since you have to take it apart. Also, there is a risk of cutting oneself on the blade as you try to open the blade guard. I wonder how long the plastic hinge will last on the guard, as takes apart and reassemble when disassembling for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Wagner Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Get this instead of a regular pizza cutter or pizza rocker
customer_reviews.text: Much safer than a scary pizza rocker, easier to clean than a pizza cutter, faster than a regular knife which would dull faster, and just good modular build quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting more than pizza!
customer_reviews.text: One of those cases where you're not really sure why the previous version was ever even invented. I know you're probably thinking that your kitchen knife works fine, and that's cool. I don't know that I would get this *just** for pizza, but for a parent who needs to cut food into safe sized pieces all of the time, this is a great little gadget that does the job quicker, easier, and arguably safer if you close it when you're done. Washes easily, holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Y.

customer_reviews.title: Combination of no leverage and dull = rolling it back and forth multiple times just ...
customer_reviews.text: Combination of no leverage and dull = rolling it back and forth multiple times just to open cuts already made by the pizza place. Too late to return so I'm discarding standard handle/roller model.
customer_reviews.author: Len Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Hitter for Low Price
customer_reviews.text: This cutter is awesome! I was a little worried when I purchased (the price was the deciding factor), but my husband -- the intended user -- LOVED it! Contoured to fit the hand perfectly, and our big mitts worked too 😊 I have to buy a couple more for us and for gifts! If u have wrist strength issues or find handled cutters hard to use to cut thru the crust, this is definitely the item for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although it looks cool, it didn't perform as intended. Cheese got stuck up in the housing. Didn't cut well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt House

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't glide smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pizza cutter for 15 months. About 4 months ago it just stopped gliding. It sticks, picking up, and then tearing the pizza. It's also lost sharpness so I find myself having to go over and over to cut pizza. As a mom of 4 kids we have pizza often several times a week. Maybe it just can't stand constant use? I can honestly say now I HATE it. It takes a lot longer than a regular cutter to clean, and it just doesn't work. I'm now having to look for a replacement because I've had it trying to get this thing to work!
customer_reviews.author: MDog

customer_reviews.title: If you like having fingers, be careful with this guy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easy to hold and work for cutting, HOWEVER, there is a safety flaw with the design. You have to push the plastic tab down to expose the blade, and in doing so, it allows your fingers to come far too close to the blade. Seems like an accident waiting to happen, as it doesn't move easily and you have to use a little force to open. I have taken to using the counter to open it, for fear of cutting my fingers. I've been leaving it in the holder when putting it in the dishwasher (with the shield down) and it cleans it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why reviews are so high. My wife and I nearly cut our hands every time trying to take apart and wash it. Ones with handle are easier to use and clean in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS CUTTER
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible pizza cutter. I was using the traditional type cutter and felt the blade was getting dull. It probably was at least 10 years old. I ordered this up and what a disappointment! I make a very thin crust and this couldn’t cut through it. I had to end up using my old one just to get through the VERY thin crust. Then the cheese gets caught up in the plastic piece that covers the blade. I have no idea how to take this thing apart to clean it. Anyway, don’t buy this cutter. IT’S TERRIBLE! COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: Cutting pizza is always a challenge--getting through the crust, without destroying it, and on to the good stuff, without miring in all that cheese etc.! This cutter is sharp, so no challenge for the crust or the cheese. The blade, when not in use, is totally covered by the handle (cover), plus a plastic shield for the exposed blade. Cleaning the blade is a small challenge, but no major issue for those folk with some dexterity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pizza Cutter, Space Saver & Safer Cutting Option
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived fast and in perfect condition: Pros: Nice professional look Excellent pizza cutter Round handle-less option saves drawer space It has a nice grip which is easy to hold while you're cutting Protective blade cover is a nice safety feature Easy to take apart and clean Cons: Nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: cleaning this is a pain in the ass.
customer_reviews.text: it cuts well but you have to clean it and its not just throwing the damn thing in the dishwasher either you have to take it apart and then put it back together. I hate it and am going to sell it on ebay because i am so sick of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Blade cover saves my fingers getting cuts!
customer_reviews.text: It is ergonomic, blade very sharp, love the ability to slide protection over blade, reaching into my over full utensil drawer can be dangerous (lol) and now I have a pizza cutter has added safety of not getting cut grabbing it as well as keeping blade covered so it doesn’t dull being pushed around drawer! Seller is awesome, making effort to make sure a buyer can ask additional questions/tips.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say, but blade is not sharp. Moreover it’s not easy to clean because you have to rotate the blade inside the case, & chances of getting cut by the blade. Definitely not ergonomic I wondered why people gave such positive reviews & I got in the trap. It came to my knowledge that people who give such excellent & positive reviews belong to either seller’s family or friends or who receive the product without having to pay. Don’t waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.author: Ra M.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pizza cutter and this seemed very unique. I love the look of it, it's easy to hold and cut with, and most of all, it's comes apart easily into separate pieces for full cleaning after each pizza I make. I think it's better than most cutters that are cheaper than it, but I do feel like the price on this one is a little high. I use almost weekly, and I really wanted something easy to clean and store, otherwise I probably would have went with a conventional cutter that's half the cost. I am happy with this cutter though, after using it at least 7 times.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brownell

customer_reviews.title: The one and only thing it should actually do, it does poorly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I finally decided that I make/eat enough pizza to warrant a pizza cutter. Against my better judgement of buying a traditional pizza cutter I purchased this after seeing the great reviews. This cutter required multiple cuts back and forth just to get through a relatively thin crust pizza. The only upside to this product is how easy it is to clean if you have a dishwasher since you can just take it all apart.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best pizza cutter ever.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a pizza cutter from his bachelor days and that thing was horrible and you had to go over the pizza lines 100 times before it would cut. I decided to splurge for this and I am so glad I did. It not only works good for slicing pizza, but makes precise cuts in pieces for small fingers. Best purchase. I love that I also can take it apart for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Doeberl

customer_reviews.title: Just not for us
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and does cut pizza very well. The cover slides over the blade for safe storage. These are the good points. The issue we had was taking it apart to clean it. We had several near misses when it came to slicing fingers open. Handling the circular blade when cleaning is a delicate operation. Definitely not something you want around kids. We're going back to our one-piece handled pizza wheel. You might love this pizza cutter, but it's just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: This pizza cutter works as expected. I’ve had it about a year and have had no problems using it. I use it to cut pizza, or dough for breadstick and rolls. It’s been great. My only complaint is that it’s a little annoying to clean. It’s super easy to take apart and put back together. It even has a nice protected cover that’s snaps in place but It is an extra step when it comes time to clean it. Still a great buy but not sure if I love that part about it, which is totally a preference. Other than that, the functionality of it has been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Taurean Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Handy little pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: This cutter is quite easy to use. You can apply a lot more downward force with it compared to a standard pizza cutter, while being more comfortable to hold. Cleaning is the only area I can dock the rating. I wash it on the top rack of the dishwasher after taking it apart. So, I t’s easy to take apart and clean, but a regular pizza cutter doesn’t need to be taken apart. I’d say it’s a 5 star product if you have hand or wrist issues, but since I don’t, I’m putting up 4. I’d still recommend it to a friend for sure though!
customer_reviews.author: Keegan B. Connell

customer_reviews.title: Kitchy Pizza Cutter Wheel Cuts More then Just Pizza!
customer_reviews.text: The Kitchy Pizza Cutter Wheel cuts more than just Pizza! My daughter has 2 boys (ages 4 yrs & 2 yrs old) and she uses it to cut everything from Pizza to Chicken Tenders. She even uses it to cut up fruit. I used it this morning to cut up pancakes for my grandsons and it works great to cut the crust off bread. The blade protector keeps your fingers safe from the really sharp cutter wheel and it all snaps open to make cleaning it a breeze. The Kitchy Cutter Wheel has become my “go to” kitchen gadget. The uses are endless!
customer_reviews.author: BgInAz

customer_reviews.title: The greatest multi tasker!
customer_reviews.text: For those Alton Brown fans out there, you know this is one of his favorite multi taskers - mine too, now. I had always used regular pizza cutters. Never again. This has so much control. Anything you want to cut, this should do it. Well, maybe not pie. But any kind of dough - yes. Easy to open and clean. Read the instructions if you are not sure how to open it. AND it has a cover for the blade so it is safe in your drawer, won't rub against other things, or accidentally cut you. I have only used it a few times so far, but so far I am enjoying this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Julie E

customer_reviews.title: A Pizza Cutter worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cut pizza on Thursdays at an elementary/Middle school I volunteer at. The pre-school , Kindergarten and first grade get there pizza piece cut in half. I also have to cut some of the other pieces not cut so well from the pizza restaurant where they are cooked. This cutter works great. Easy to handle, sharp and light in weight. It's really easy to clean. Either rinse under water or take it apart for end of day dishwasher cleaning. I Love it and recommend it. It's also inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of scary how much easier this one is. It's much easier to hold, easier on the wrist and so easy to clean. Being able to take it apart in seconds and clean it is so nice. I have used it for sandwiches, tortillas, pizza, subs, it is just so much easier to grab then a knife sometimes. I wish I would have bought one sooner. And being able to cover the blade up is a nice bonus as well. You never have to worry about reaching into the utility drawer as long as someone didn't leave it open.
customer_reviews.author: Wayward Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the pizza !
customer_reviews.text: I realize it has taken me a little time to review this Pizza cutter .But I never review anything until it is tested . With that said , I really like this thing . Not only is it kool looking but it works great and cleans easy and glad I purchased it . Also a bargain of a price as I'm always glad to find a good deal and this just happens to be one of those good deals.
customer_reviews.author: EErock

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Well built, sturdy, feels good for larger hands too. Love that it has a blade cover for storage. Can be taken apart for cleaning, but honestly we just put it (open) in the top rack of the dishwasher and the sprayers clean it well every time. Then we leave it in a draining rack until it dried, then close and store. We find this much easier than taking it apart. Would definitely buy again --- but it is so well-built -- very doubtful we'll need another one anytime soon. :-)
customer_reviews.author: SharonW

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter, but not great in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Does great at cutting, especially a pizza in the box since you don’t have the extra space taken up with the handle, and you can get good downward pressure on the blade. My only complaint is it being tricky to get totally clean in the dishwasher. If it isn’t positioned just right the portion of the blade hidden by the handle may not get clean. It is best to clean this by hand.
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but won’t last
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this pizza cutter, but it’s apparent that it’s not going to last long. It is very easy to dissemble to clean effectively, which I have only done three times (upon arriving, and after using twice). The clear plastic blade cover is already showing white lines at the seam where it opens/closes, exposing where the plastic is becoming week. Fortunately the cutter does still go together without the blade cover, but there would be concerns about the safety of leaving it in the drawer with the blade exposed.
customer_reviews.author: S Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza cutter I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I love how this cutter doesn’t have the long handle that pizza cutters usually have. This one is so more versatile and easier to cut because it has better grip and slides very easily. I have used it to cut pizza and make Rugelach cookies and it worked wonders! Also, the customers service is amazing! I didn’t have any problems with my product and still Tom made sure to follow up and check if I was satisfied with the purchase. It feels nice to purchase something from a small company and know that I’ll be helping a family like mine, and not just helping a big company’s CEO buy their fifth yacht.
customer_reviews.author: Vitoria S O

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, you can get better for the same price!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this because of the high amount of reviews and high rating from other reviewers, the blade looked good. After testing it out in real time, I noticed the blade is not sharp, so it doesn't cut through pizza in one go, or even two, but it takes quite a bit (even with putting strength in the wheel), overall this product is worth $4 max, and can find better options at a normal store
customer_reviews.author: Freshener

customer_reviews.title: Cute design - does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought the red one. The design and colors make this fun for the kitchen. I do find it a little awkward when holding it though compared to a handle. It did take running over the pizza at least 2-3 times to cut it. As far as kitchen items go, it does the job. You have to take the 3 pieces apart to throw in the dishwasher to get clean and then be careful with the blade. I wish it could stay as one piece rather then having to put it back together again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Waye

customer_reviews.title: Great Design!
customer_reviews.text: My significant other is Italian and makes a great pizza. Trouble is, she’s 4’11, and the center island is 3’1. She can’t put her full force onto a traditional pizza wheel. I’ve offered to cut pizza many times, but she’s a perfectionist and threatens me with a wooden spoon if I attempt it. The Kitchy works as advertised and really makes it simple for her to put full force onto the pie. Add easy disassembly and reassembly after cleaning and it’s perfect. Great design work.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the blade guard and it’s great.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and sturdy, but overly complicated. This would be better if there was no guard, it adds unwanted complexity to what could be an extremely simple product. Thankfully, the guard can be removed without affecting its use. But seriously, opening and closing the guard requires you to run your fingers dangerously close to the blade for the length of the exposed blade. Wicked sketchy. Great for cutting the crust off of PB&J sandwiches
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Easy Disassembly, Assembly, and Cleaning! Large size and very sharp too!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all around. This thing is definitely sharp, but what’s even better is that it’s super easy to clean. Yes it sounds tedious and stupid to have to take apart a pizza cutter just to be able to clean it, and it is, but this is such a great quality pizza cutter that it doesn’t even matter. The process of taking it apart and putting it back together is so effortless and can be done in less than 10 seconds. The cutter is large and sharp as well. What more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot
customer_reviews.text: Why are the reviews on this product so high? Maybe it works better for something other than pizza but I'm not really impressed with this product. I see where you can use it on veges and I've not tried that but it's awkward to use and doesn't really cut well. I admit it looks like a neat product and a fine idea but doesn't work well for me. I'll be looking for another pizza cutter!
customer_reviews.author: Tigerdag

customer_reviews.title: For more than just pizza!
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of 2 small children, I am constantly cutting food- this thing is a life saver! It glides quickly and smoothly, and it is so much easier on my wrist. My old slicer I used to have to do multiple swipes and press down hard, which resulted in uneven slices, which small children aren't fond of. It's easier to clean than a standard slicer, and I love that it has a built in safety guard so forgetful people like me can't lose it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pierce

customer_reviews.title: I like this!
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually better in person than in the description. The blade is sharp and a great pizza cutting device, but not so sharp I am afraid of cutting myself [which I was a little concerned with for the sake of my kids]. Best is the plastic protector, which is convenient and makes safe storage very easy. I've had it a few weeks and have washed it in the dishwashwer [top rack] at least 4 times now. Every time it comes out clean and still intact. A great idea, portable and easy to use anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizza Cutter Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is easy to grip and cuts through pizza the first time without dragging through and disrupting the toppings. I don't worry about children using it because there is no danger of their hands slipping down onto a sharp metal wheel like traditional pizza cutters. All sharp edges are completely covered and the rubber grip is perfect for both small and large hands. Also love that I can take it apart completely to clean it thoroughly and that the cover is built-in so I can store it safely. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cataleya

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Or at least read this review
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t like it. And this is from 20 years of pizza cutter use and I usually have 3 at a time. It barely cuts anything, even my husband has trouble. It’s more dangerous bc it looks like you can just grab it but you can’t , fingers are way way closer to the blades. It’s not easy to clean bc you’re holding onto blades to wrestle the thing apart. I’m not sure why it got such great reviews? But I’m going to buy a different one!
customer_reviews.author: breeze

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cover broke but was sent a replacement
customer_reviews.text: *Follow up* I was contacted by the seller and they were very courteous and sent a replacement after seeing the issue. While the cutter did break, the replacement and excellent customer service (beyond the Amazon return window) made it worth the initial investment and I would shop with them again without hesitation. Original issue: Really liked this at first but unfortunately the plastic piece that holds the cover shut broke making it pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Well and is Super Easy to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pizza cutter. The design allows you to use more arm/body strength, and not solely rely on your hand strength. Pros: Great design- comfortable to use Cuts pizza easily Super easy to clean. The gray and green outer cover pops open. Once open, you can remove the clear cover and blade. I hand wash all our knives, but you could easily put this in the dishwasher Cons: None so far- I'll update the review is I find a con
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. HawkinsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Updated review!
customer_reviews.text: The blade seemed blunt when we sliced the pizza in the cardboard box. Have just sliced the pizza on a wooden chopping board, and the Kitchy pizza wheel worked perfectly! It IS sharp! Just don't slice it on cardboard! Original review: This item is cleverly designed, well made, and easy to clean, but the blade is too dull to cut through pizza. If the blade were sharp, it would be perfect. Such a shame to get so much right and then to fail on the key component.
customer_reviews.author: HMM

customer_reviews.title: Better than most. Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pizza cutter I’ve purchased like this one. The first one lasted far longer than any other cutter I’ve ever owned in the past. So I’m buying again. The only bad thing I could say about this one is, if you run it through your dishwasher 1,000 time (like I did) the plastic becomes a bit brittle. The part that holds the metal cutter in place broke. So, I think if you hand wash these they will last a great deal longer. Or don’t put the plastic parts in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bonebrake

customer_reviews.title: Takes up less space, works great!
customer_reviews.text: After remodeling our kitchen, I was interested in upgrading some of our kitchen tools. Our pizza cutter was small and basic, and very well used, so I was looking for something more modern. This takes up very little space in our new drawers, and works really well. Pretty easy to clean. If your pizza is *really* thick, it's a bit tougher to use as it smooshes your pizza, but on most pizzas it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Best Wheel Pizza Cutter EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of fighting and constantly tightening the screw on my old pizza cutter in order for it to work. I knew there has to something much better out there, a pizza cutter that actually worked without the frustration of it coming apart because the screw loosens and it falls apart. When I see this cutter I knew it had to be a better alternative and I am so glad I made this purchase! We use it constantly, not just for pizza, also quesadillas, sandwiches, etc. I live this pizza wheel, its genius!!! Buy it, you will not be disappointed. You'll thank yourself for it 😍
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good of an idea as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great idea, but it’s a bit weird to use. We found it to be a bit difficult if you are cutting inside a pizza box because the store didn’t cut it well. The wheel can’t move far out enough to cut the crust. Also the blade protector was constantly getting in the way. Also it must be taken apart completely to clean. I decided to send it back and go with a traditional cutter.
customer_reviews.author: racegirl1000

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pizza cutter!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this pizza cutter! It is by far my favorite! It is very easy to hold and to clean. I also really love that it has a plastic cover that goes over the blade for storage. Especially because I have little hands reaching into my kitchen drawers all the time. So it is incredibly safe. Also it is pretty great that it comes completely apart so you can clean every little part of it unlike a lot of the older pizza cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Rensink

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted and return is not available
customer_reviews.text: I am giving the 3 stars not because I don't like the product, but because I searched for "plastic pizza cutters" that can be used safely on non-stick pans. This is what came up and quite frankly the picture does not make it look like it's metal necessarily. So when I purchased and now tried to return ( I already have a metal pizza cutter so I don't need a second one) Amazon is not letting me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Feels good cuts well
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it looked different. When it arrived I had the opportunity to use it right away. It feels good in my hand, and allows me to put the pressure I need for it to cut. I put it in the dishwasher and it came out perfectly clean. The plastic cover the goes over the sharp part just slides into the handle and slides back out for storage. So far I am impressed, and would reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Veach

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I was worried how sturdy it would be, we all know how sturdy those cheap made ones were in the past we have gotten, that’s not the case with this. This is very sturdy and easy to use, the guard on it is a great idea as well. It comes apart easily enough to clean the whole thing, which is awesome as well, says my OCD. And goes back together easily and stows away well when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to clean. My husband and I disagree that knives work just as well to cut pizzas as a pizza cutter. So I was looking for one that was easy to clean to make him happy. This exceeded all my expectations! It doesn’t get gunky from use and I love the guard to keep fingers safe while digging in my kitchen gadget drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionary in the world of pizza cutters!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You can take it apart to clean it! I know of no other pizza cutter that does that! To be perfectly transparent - I have yet to use this to cut pizza; I cut quesadillas the other night. It worked as a pizza cutter should. Nothing extra-ordinary about that... But then you open the casing and it come completely apart! Now you don't need to worry about all the gooey cheese or pepperoni particles that get stuck. This is revolutionary in the world of pizza cutters!! Love it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long, really.
customer_reviews.text: Was great for the first bit, plastic part that locks the sides together broke, before that just stopped clicking together well. Didn't last a year before it broke. And no, it's not like I'm hard on things or make pizza that often.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking but not useful.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this out a few times and don't really like it. It does look pretty cool but the usability is not really there. The case is too big so when you cut a thicker pizza it gets all dirty and in the way of the blade, making it harder to cut. When you need to wash it you need to disassemble it every time, dry it, and then put back together. This way you need to wash 3 pieces instead of just 1.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It is so sharp, even a thick pizza only needs one pass to cut cleanly, all the way through. The cover is awesome (especially when you have little hands that like to search kitchen drawers). It is easy to clean so far, just spin and wash each side of the blade. I haven't really figured out how to dry the attached plastic cover, so it usually air dried and seems to be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza cutter ever! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza cutter! I had a similar one that finally broke after years of use, so I bought this as a replacement. My old one had a cover, but I was always losing it. This one has an ingeniously designed cover that keeps it attached to the cutter! Brilliant! No more losing the cover. Plus, it pulls apart for easy cleaning and is nice and sharp. Great purchase! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design
customer_reviews.text: Does a fabulous job on the pizza. Comes apart easily for clean up. Fits perfectly in your hand. I bought this to replace an older version of more or less the same thing that I'd worn out. The blade cover on this one simply pivots up and locks into place within the handle, very slick design. The old model that I had came with a detachable protector that was almost immediately misplaced. All pros, no cons.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kirwan

customer_reviews.title: Okay pizza cutter. Best with thin crust.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, for my husband, for Christmas. It's awesome! I love how much easier this is to wash. It feels like a good quality item. I worried that it would be just another gadget, but it seems like a great little tool. I will definitely be throwing out the old pizza cutters. UPDATE Feb 2019: So this was great in the beginning, but taking it apart and putting it back to together wore on the plastic parts. It's now a back up and we have to be careful. Also, if the pizza is too deep, it's difficult to cut. This is best used with thin crust.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Kitchen Utensil
customer_reviews.text: This pizza cutter has far exceeded my expectation. I expected something a little less durable and a little lower quality. I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the package and found it to be quite well made with very good materials. It is super easy to clean and disassemble. I thought perhaps it may not be as solid because it does open down the seam but again pleasantly surprised. After assembling and disassembling it multiple times it still feels sturdy. I used it for cutting all kinds of things and not just pizza. I am very happy I purchased this and look forward to continued usage.
customer_reviews.author: Alan LeMay

customer_reviews.title: Great little upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Our cheapie pizza cutter roller busted and we'd been using big knives for a little while, so our standards aren't super high to begin with. That said, I figured as a Pizza Loving Household, we should have the right tools for the job. This is a great, affordable gadget that is straight forward and does a solid job. It rolls easily, is very sharp (careful when dismantling for cleaning!), and can be taken apart with very little effort
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing a pizza cutter and have never been happy with standard ones. I like this one because it is easy to put pressure directly where you need it when cutting a pizza. It is easy to disassemble and clean. I take care to at least rinse off the blade thoroughly immediately after using to prevent cheese from getting stuck on it - a good safety measure. I really like the design of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is easy to clean. The blade is easy to take apart and it can go in the dishwasher. The case does not usally get dirty so it's just too wash the blade and snap it back inside. It take some getting used to coming from a regular pizza cutter but it's not that bad. Also very convenient to safely transport for parties etc when the guard is closed. I usually have it in a draw with other kitchen tools and really like if I am digging around I don't have an exposed sharp object in there.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great little gizmo!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to send in this review until I'd used and washed it several times. I use it cut up salad greens. The blade is extremely sharp yet its design makes it safe to use. Washes easily. Doesn't take up too much storage space. The item was well packaged and arrived quickly. The vendor reaches out to ensure customer satisfaction. Extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jabberwock

customer_reviews.title: Great for deep dish
customer_reviews.text: We live in Chicago, so everyone once in a while we get a deep dish pizza. And you when you buy them they come uncut. This is a great pizza cutter for thick and thin pizza. And I like that the case closes so it is safe in my drawer. The only suggestion I would have is that I wish you could open it up to clean the inside of the case. Other than that it is great
customer_reviews.author: Brewhill

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizza Cutter Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my hand. Amazing cut right thru the self rising pizza. I love this kitchen gadget. Very impressed with the little doohickey. It's better than the old fashioned ones. I was desperately in need of a new one, as my family eats pizza weekly. So I thought I'd give this one a try. And I'm so glad I did. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Balentine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza cutter. It works great, even better than a cutter with a handle if you have a particularly crunchy crust to cut through. It is very easy to clean, though I, admit I, can't remember how to take it apart. 😂 So, I keep the box with the instructions so I will know how. Maybe after we've had it longer I, will remember how it comes apart. 😂
customer_reviews.author: MireilleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: BEST PIZZA CUTTER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the best pizza cutter I have ever had. It slices easily and is very comfortable in hand. It is also extremely easy to take apart to clean. The company even sent a personal email to me thanking me for my business. Prior to this purchase, I have never received one from any other company I have purchased from. From now on, this will be my go-to gift for all of my friends and family! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a fantastic pizza cutter!
customer_reviews.author: McKenna P.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only one issue with this device and thats that some things get stuck inside, but it can be rinsed out so this thing gets my full approval. Chopping herbs and garlic is the pits, so this device is great to use for those items. Its also great for pizza! Its fantastic!! You must spend your money on "work smarter, not harder" devices and this is one of those!!
customer_reviews.author: firemedic2008

customer_reviews.title: Really neat pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: I have been using pizza cutters with a handle for years. This cutter is a great design. The pressure for cutting is placed directly on the wheel. Easy to take apart and clean. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: SLK

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a pizza cutter that you can completely clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design on this unit. Comes fully assembled, with small instructions on how to dismantle after use and clean up. I like that the clear plastic cover clicks into place and covers the cutting blade while it is not in use. Easy to dismantle, simply lift up on green side, and this allows you to remove the circular blade and the clear plastic cover for complete cleaning. Nice addition to your kitchen utensil drawer! woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had a pizza cutter but it was flimsy and I had to go back over the cut multiple times. This cutter only has to go over the cut one time. It is simply superior from a physics stand point. You can get much better downward pressure on the item you are cutting. It is easy to clean. I am thinking about making some cheese quesadillas and I think this will do a great job on them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart W. Mckeel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been keen on having a pizza cutter because they seemed like an accident hanging around. This cutter is terrific. The guard encloses the blade so it’s not a hazard in the kitchen drawer. It easily snaps a part so that it’s easy to clean and goes right back together. Very easy and comfortable to use. I’ve used to cut pizza and to cut dough for rolls. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: SuSu

customer_reviews.title: Dull
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this three times total and it’s horrible. The first two times it barely cut through the pizza. I tried edging it and that didn’t held at all. I don’t know if I just got a bum one or what, but it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best things I've ever bought for my kitchen. It's sharp enough to cut my pizza and it's cute to. I like that it has the piece that goes around the blade for safety too ! It's very functional and I'd buy again if anything ever happens to mine. And I've gotten compliments on it too, about it being smooth and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bussey

customer_reviews.title: Better than it looks (and it looks great!)
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations...the size is great for multi-tasking! (yes I'm an Alton Brown devotee of the "only one Uni-tasker allowed!) - it is easy to hold, use and clean! - breaks down easily and more important.. goes back together just as easy... the guard which I thought would get in the way actually works well to protect in storage and locks back securely during use! ... I know it's a simple tool but the little things mean a lot... and this just works!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable grip, easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza cutter! It has a comfortable grip, and is very sturdy when cutting the pizza, meaning it doesn't wobble around like the handled ones do. Plus it has an attached sleeve to cover the blade when not in use. The whole thing is 3 pieces and it's very easy to assemble and disassemble. It's also dishwasher safe, and because it comes apart, you know all the pieces are completely cleaned, with no nooks and crannies for pizza or water to hide out. I'm seriously considering buying a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Careful opening protective blade gaurd
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be easy to hold and cuts well. However, the protective blade guard ironically makes you more prone to getting cut and needs to be redesigned. If you slide your finger to open the cover there is a very good chance you will cut you finger on the blade. The ridge to open the blade cover needs to be longer and protruding out more so you can open the cover away from the blade and not towards it. I ended up just removing the cover to prevent any chance of cutting myself while opening the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: I like pizza and I like this
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of pizza and making it at home. I broke my last traditional pizza cutter by putting too much pressure when pushing down to try and cut the crust. This works great as you keep the weight right over the cutting wheel making it much easier to cut through. Clean-up is easy also - just pop the three pieces apart and drop in the dishwasher. I do scrape off any cheese as my dishwasher does not make that disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C

customer_reviews.title: I expected more.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't overly impressed. I expected more based on the good reviews. Doesn't seem very sharp. Takes more effort than I expected for a brand new pizza cutter I guess nothing compares to my 10+ year old pampered chef pizza cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun little pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size of this pizza cutter. When I saw the picture I knew it would be great for me. I make a lot of homemade pizzas for my family and this is great. I've only used it once so far but it did the job. Clean up was easy, just be aware the blade is sharp. I have to be honest the same day I received this I went to a local retailer who had the same thing (different company name) for half the price. But I'm not upset just thought that was great irony. Order this and you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Donnell

customer_reviews.title: but not dull either. Has held up to mutliple uses per ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough for the price, but can be awkward to get evenly cut because your hand covers so much when getting lined up. Also, for thicker things it can scrape the top (deep dish pizza etc.) Works as expected, not overly sharp, but not dull either. Has held up to mutliple uses per week for several months with no signs of wear and tear. Comes apart (for cleaning) and goes back together easily while staying safely secure while using. Is a good but not fantastic pizza cutter.
customer_reviews.author: L. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe-easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher safe-easy to use and clean. Love the plastic retractable cover for the stainless steel blade. All parts can be easily un-snapped and separated when placing in the dishwasher or just retract and drop in the dishwasher. Seems to clean up nicely either way- which is great when you have lazy teenagers in the house who like to eat frozen pizza late at night after everyone else is asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Curtis

customer_reviews.title: More dull than a butterknife :(
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of the item but I believe the longevity would be short. Regardless, the blade of the item I received is more dull than an average butterknife which makes this product useless.
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: The design of this pizza cutter is top-notch - it's super easy to clean, store, and use. I have been resistant to buying a pizza cutter for a long time since you can just cut pizza with a knife and I hate to have a bunch of one-use gadgets lying around in my tiny kitchen, but this thing has proved its worth already.
customer_reviews.author: kapplejack

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Play at first was concerned at the hassle of taking it apart to get the blade out to clean it but it was quite easy! It’s very sharp and I find that I can cut the pizzas so much easier with this one over the old one that had the handle. The casing is very strong and gives the impression it will have long endurance
customer_reviews.author: Rand Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Simply cuts pizza
customer_reviews.text: This pizza cutter has a nice cover to protect the blade and yourself. It disassembles easy for thorough cleaning. It is small which helps reduce clutter in drawers. It also happens to cut pizza perfectly fine and the handle makes it quite easy to adjust angles. Overall, it's a really nice tool if you happen to make pizzas on occasion, or just want to slice up some pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Best “pizza” cutter ever!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this to cut way more than just pizza. I use it to cut brownies, fudge, sandwiches... When I bake brownies or make fudge, I use parchment paper instead of spraying the pan. Once they’re cooled I lift it out of the pan, place it on a cutting board and use the “pizza” cutter. Faster and easier. Best design for cleaning! Nothing to rust!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I’d give this zero stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: This pizza cutter isn’t easy to use, clean, or ergonomic. It hurts my wrist to apply enough pressure to cut the pizza, pizza remnants get in and it doesn’t come apart so it’s difficult to clean. This is the worst pizza cutter I’ve ever owned and I’m throwing it in the trash. I have no idea why this is so highly reviewed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O’Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My man and I make our own pizza at home all the time, so a pizza wheel is an essential in our house. When our last one broke, I went to Amazon to search for a new one, and this seemed to be the most popular and had great reviews, so I bought it. I've only used it once so far, but I was very happy with it... it cut very easily without applying a ton of pressure, and it was very easy to clean. Hopefully it will do good work in our kitchen for the years to come :)
customer_reviews.author: Needlephile

customer_reviews.title: Good pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: This pizza cutter was a replacement for a similar one that we had that had broken. It works well and fits the need. I do wish that it had a quick release button for the plastic cover rather than manually having to open, but we knew when we purchased it this product did not have that feature. Good pizza cutter!
customer_reviews.author: Sean & Sherry D

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizza Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Had a similar one many years ago but definitely not even close to this ones quality. Love the safety features and it comes completely apart (with ease) for good cleaning. It's cut, safe, and better, cuts pizza with ease! This company was fast to ship, delivered a great product and even reached out with a customer service follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies.
customer_reviews.text: I have Celiac disease and cannot share utensils with my family. This thing is awesome because it comes in different colors so everybody knows which one mine is AND it's got a cover so when it's out being used I still don't have to worry about cross contamination on it. Easy to clean and most importantly doesn't squeak like every other pizza cutter we've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soo smooth cutting
customer_reviews.text: By far the best pizza cutter i ever bought. Dont have to worry about carelessly cutting my hands... just dont close it when ur cutting or else the grease gets inside the plastic cover and i had to use a pipe cleaner to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: eb couponlvr

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Buy one now!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One for myself and another as a gift. We both love it! This is an awesome design that is both safe to use and clean. The cutter has a built in clear guard that locks in place over the blade when not in use. The cutter may also be fully disassembled for easy cleaning and reassembly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Please look elsewhere for a pizza cutter
customer_reviews.text: After Purchasing this projuct it became evident fairly quickly that it was going to be a pain. Very difficult to clean and further doesn't cut very well I would suggest you stay far away from this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this pizza cutter. However, when I used it the first time, it did not cut the pizza all the way through, so I still had to use my "pizza scissors" to cut the slices. I was disappointed! I can't imagine what I did wrong after making my own pizza for over 40 years!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pizza cutter and thought this would work better than traditional type cutters with a handle. The cutter works okay -- cuts the pizza fairly easily but I don't like the way you have to be right over the pizza. Prefer having the handle which gets your hands away from the hot pie. Works but I'll be buying a new cutter with a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Easy to clean. Larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who loves pizza and can cook his own, but who also struggles with slicing it up with a regular pizza cutter. This works much better for him. I like that you can put pressure directly over the blade rather than at an angle through the handle. I also love that it's really essay to take apart and clean. It is yet a little big for my son's hands. It's even a little big for my own hands, but I have small hands. Nevertheless, my son is far more successful and less frustrated with his pizza than he has been with other cutters. I may get a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

product_meta.title: Kitchy Pizza Cutter Wheel - Super Sharp and Easy To Clean Slicer, Kitchen Gadget with Protective Blade Guard (Green)
feature_bullets: SLICE ANY PIZZA LIKE A PRO – This pizza cutter will leave you shocked with how easy it is to get a nice, clean cut through your pizza. With its ergonomic handle and flawless finish, you won’t have to cut back and forth and you get to keep your toppings where they belong - on your pizza.

SUPER SHARP AND FITS IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND - Why waste money on bulky pizza rockers that don’t even fit in your kitchen cabinet when you can simply get this unique design that easily fits in your hand and also in your cutlery drawer.
PROTECTIVE BLADE GUARD FOR EASY STORAGE – This pizza knife comes with a blade guard to keep your cutter securely stored away when you’re not using it.

DISASSEMBLES FOR THOROUGH CLEANING AND DISHWASHER SAFE – You can take it apart in 3 simple steps and put it in the dishwasher for thorough cleaning (take a look at the product images to see how it works). Please be careful when handling the steel blade, it is sharp.

LIFETIME 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We're so confident that you'll love the KITCHY pizza cutter that we'll refund every penny if you don't like it! Actually, most customers like it so much they buy more than 1 and give it out to their friends and family!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars10,464 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
